comments.body: for 'conditional chaining' which we are using in daml-react we need a newer typescript compiler which apparently we get from to npm dependencies. I updated it to 3.7.4.
I know. But your change should not affect this file but rather the one in `language-support/ts/packages/yarn.lock`.

diffHunk:
@@ -4014,10 +4014,10 @@ typedarray@^0.0.6:
   resolved "https://registry.yarnpkg.com/typedarray/-/typedarray-0.0.6.tgz#867ac74e3864187b1d3d47d996a78ec5c8830777"
   integrity sha1-hnrHTjhkGHsdPUfZlqeOxciDB3c=
 
-typescript@3.1.6:
-  version "3.1.6"
-  resolved "https://registry.yarnpkg.com/typescript/-/typescript-3.1.6.tgz#b6543a83cfc8c2befb3f4c8fba6896f5b0c9be68"
-  integrity sha512-tDMYfVtvpb96msS1lDX9MEdHrW4yOuZ4Kdc4Him9oU796XldPYF/t2+uKoX0BBa0hXXwDlqYQbXY5Rzjzc5hBA==
+typescript@3.7.4:
+  version "3.7.4"
+  resolved "https://registry.yarnpkg.com/typescript/-/typescript-3.7.4.tgz#1743a5ec5fef6a1fa9f3e4708e33c81c73876c19"
+  integrity sha512-A25xv5XCtarLwXpcDNZzCGvW2D1S3/bACratYBx2sax8PefsFhlYmkQicKHvpYflFS8if4zne5zT5kpJ7pzuvw==
